text.paragraph: List of completed, amended, or rescinded Advance Directives on record at Department of Veterans Affairs facilities. An actual copy of the Directive is not included.

Combined list of recent functional and cognitive assessments recorded at Department of Defense and Veterans Affairs (VA).
VA Functional Independence Measurement (FIM) Scale: 1 = Total Assistance (Subject = 0% +), 2 = Maximal Assistance (Subject = 25% +), 3 = Moderate Assistance (Subject = 50% +), 4 = Minimal Assistance (Subject = 75% +), 5 = Supervision, 6 = Modified Independence (Device), 7 = Complete Independence (Timely, Safely).
